hunks.source: main();  function main() {   let n = +cin.shift(); let B = {}; let C = {}; cin.forEach((v, i) => { const x = Number(v); B[i + 1 + x] = B[i + 1 + x] + 1 || 1; C[i + 1 - x] = C[i + 1 - x] + 1 || 1; });  let keys = Object.keys(B); let ans = 0; keys.filter(i => C[i]).forEach(i => { ans += (B[i] * C[i]);  });  console.log(ans); }
